short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy access to your design content so you can rapidly build in Articulate Rise, Storyline, or any LMS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transfer course design content into the destination learning platform, quickly and easily with the Coursensu Design Assistant. 

This extension is created for any instructional designer, learning designer and course creator. It sits alongside your course build process and provides easy access to everything in your learning designs as you build the learning experience. 

You'll get: 

- Access to your learning designs on Coursensu
- Quick navigation within each design 
- Easy access to your design content 
- One-click copy of key course content to the clipboard
- Plain text, Rich text and HTML versions of any design content 
- Popup mode, to keep the assistant open as you work. 

Seamlessly connect your designs into your chosen content or learning management system. Reduce the wasting time with exporting, importing and shifting docs around with this helpful extension. 

Compatible with all major learning management systems, virtual learning environments and content management systems.
